WorkItem.ClosedComment: I verified this was indeed the behavior with 0.9.5 on my machine. Using our latest bits things are working correctly now.
WorkItem.Description:
Hi, [work item #854](https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/854) was closed as fixed in version 0.9.5.

But when an out file is specified the compile on save fails with "Output generation failed" on the status bar.

To reproduce:

1. Create a new TypeScript project in Visual Studion (Ultimate 2013).
2. Set the following project options:
      - Compile on save
      - Combine JavaScript output into file:  out.js
3. Edit a TS file in the project and save.
4. Status bar displays error message.
WorkItem.Summary: Compile on Save does not work if an OutFile name specified - 2
